items.sentence: I found a bird whose wing was severely damaged.
I think that most young people like rock music.
I saw a flash of lightning far in the distance.
I caught sight of a fly escaping from the room.
I was just about to go out, when the bell rang.
I hadn't bargained on such a heavy traffic jam.
I must confer with my colleagues on the matter.
I suspect they water down the beer in that pub.
I wonder if we could have the table over there.
I ran into my friend at the theater last night.
I can fall back on my savings if I lose my job.
I had scarcely left home when it began to rain.
I was about to go out, when the telephone rang.
The doctors fear that Tom may never walk again.
Tom will bake a cake for Mary's birthday party.
Tom said that he was going to do that tomorrow.
Tom said that Mary wanted to do that yesterday.
We need to get out of here as soon as possible.
Tom was captured and handed over to the police.
Tom and Mary fought over the TV remote control.
